author: {'steamid': '76561198071357475', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 393, 'playtime_forever': 72, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 72, 'last_played': 1588029943}
review:
AVISO: el juego dura mucho mas de lo que dice steam porque ya lo termine, y no se porque no registro el tiempo de juego. 

BRILLANTE!!!!!! hacia tiempo que no disfrutaba tan bien un shoter de la vieja escuela. En su momento me habia parecido espectacular la primera entrega que la jugue por primera vez en 2012 porque recien para esa epoca hicieron una actualizacion para windows xp. Luego lo habia jugado este al tiempo pero no me convencia la jugabilidad porque no la entendia mucho. Ahora que lo encontre de vuelta en steam decidi darle otra oportunidad. Con mucha desconfianza ya que no poseia buena reseñas y padecia de bugs severos. Pero por fortuna encontre en el foro un parche no oficial para poder correrlo bien en windows 10 y nunca he estado mas contento por haberlo terminado ahora. Por fin termine de jugar la saga blood y a mucha honrra ya que el terror como genero me encanta y tambien los shoter gore un combo explosivo.

Antes de seguir tengo que avisarles de que hay un bug con una puerta que no se puede abrir en las oficinas de cabal co Asi que no se averguensen de usar el truco de traspasar las paredes. Porque sino es imposible pasar el nivel. 

La historia me ha parecido fantastica. Yo lo jugue en ingles asi que se requiere tener uno basico para entender mas o menos la historia. Despues de derrotar a villano del juego anterior y despues de absorver su alma Caleb el protagonista vago por la tierra en compañia de personas en ambientes de mala muerte, durante 100 años. Y poco a poco la cabala tomo muchisima influencia a lo largo de los años hasta convertirse en una importante corporacion multinacional que abarca muchisimos productos. Y su lider quiere capturarlo para hacerse con el poder del poderoso demonio en el cuerpo de caleb. A su vez aparecen numerosas criaturas de otra dimension consecuencia del gran poder en el interior de caleb que desestabiliza ambas realidades. La campaña tiene muy buen ritmo y vale mucho la pena jugarla.

Las mecanicas son basicamente como las de cualquier shoter de la bieja escuela. Matar todo lo que se mueve, interpretar el ambiente, encontrar la llave, pasar al siguiente nivel y repite el ciclo. Aca si no esperes que la partida se guarde cada 5 minutos, no esperes que la vida se regenere sola cuando te cubris, no esperes mundo abierto ni mejoras de armas y habilidades. En esta epoca se jugaba de esa manera. jugabilidad simple, agil, campaña lineal, accion directa, pura y dura. Sin vueltas. Si esta clase de juegos te aburre, segui de largo. Porque es un juego de 1998. 

El apartado artistico es lo que mas me ha fascinado. Quiza los entornos no sean tan diabolicos y grotescos como el primer juego, pero aun asi con las limitaciones de la epoca le da un muy buen acabado. Me ha fascinado muchisimo el diseño de las criaturas. Un amplio y variado lore de diferentes seres de otra dimension y bien grotescos. Me ha gustado tambien la evolucion historica de la cabala. Pasando de ser fanticos religiosos armados a equipos comando muy bien armados y entrenados.

El sonido me ha gustado mucho tambien. Es cierto que es muy monotono pero le da una ambietacion espectacular a la campaña. Por momentos la musica recuerda un poco a la de nine inche nails. Me ha gustado mucho los efectos de sonido como los disparos, Le agrega aun mas frenetismo al gore y a la accion. Y por momentos te genera una inmersion tremennda. Tambien los rugidos de cada criatura. Como si en su idioma tubieran una entoncacion distinta por cada especie. ajajajaja. 
 
Sin palabras estoy sumamente contento de haber terminado la secuela de uno de mis juegos favoritos. Si el primer blood te gusto este ultimo te va a encantar. TOTALMENTE RECOMENDABLE!!!!!!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198020093779', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 951, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 341, 'last_played': 1694300501}
review: For nostalgia sake alone is this game worth it, the soundtrack amongst other 'good' things also makes it worth the replay. There are a majority who call this game an absolute turd due to rushed production because of 'corporate pressure' over passionate development. It was unfinished and lacked much of what made the original a gem in the name of good old fashioned horror games. However we should all know a common lesson about 90's sequels for those of us old enough to remember that decade, that lesson is 'nothing is ever as good as the original' the sequels are the rushed and thoughtless successors of their formers who had more charm and soul where the sequel becomes the bastardized cash grab. This unfortunate practice echoed into films, television and games throughout the 00's where corporate greed overwhelmed serious art and passionate imagination. Blood 2 however existed in a time when the corporate greed hadn't yet killed Monolith as they rolled out successes like F.E.A.R. and Condemned before their corporate slaver forced them to make commercially friendly stuff ignoring their history whilst adding more sex and less soul to it. If you are one of those retroists who want to relive the good old days when things walked their own road and not a big wig dictated one, play this.

review: Знаете 2 часть не так уж и плоха. Что мне нравиться во 2 части так это арсенал, я сейчас не обсираю арсенал 1 части, но в нём было слишком мало обычного огнестрела. Сама идея того что действия происходят в будущем, где культ из 1 части превратиться в целую огромную секту со своими огромными корпарациями и огромным колличеством сотрудников по всему миру и нам придётся с со всеми этими мразями с помощью современного оружия даже очень хороша. Графика для своего времени не плоха. Атмосфера изменилась, но не в худшую, но и не в лучшую сторону. Сама по себе она также создают ищущение ужаса и одиночества, но не с помощью страшных врагов или гор кровищи, а с помощью локаций в которых одна тьма, чувство будто попал в гетто. Минус по мне это баги, хотите нормально играть скачайте неофициальный патч.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067783657', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1583899313}
review:
Never hopped on the Blood bandwagon back in the 90's. Still haven't even played the first one. I have absolutely no idea what the hell is going on, who I am, what my motivations are, why I'm chasing this guy, etc. But I am LOVING this! 

Sure, it copies and pastes a couple of level designs here and there, but the levels are still a whole hell of a lot more engaging than most modern AAA FPS titles.

I don't miss most aspects of the 90's, but goddamnit the latter half was such a good time for shooters.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996559457', 'num_games_owned': 510, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 30, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1467126875}
review:
Спасибо GT Interactive, что выпустили это сырое уё6ищще, благодаря чему мы можем смотреть на это и думать о вечном.
Игра часто крашится на любых системах, в ней мириады багов, мощнейший в своей дебильности сюжет, оскорбительно жирные враги и далее по списку (очень длинному списку).
Жаль что прекрасный и святой Blood не получил годного сиквела, а права у вонючих Atari которые зачем-то ожили, что тут добавишь? C'est la vie!

Любому фану блада ознакомиться быстро и решительно, считайте это BDSM приключением и получите удовольствие.

author: {'steamid': '76561198116895450', 'num_games_owned': 408, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 665, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 665, 'last_played': 1582471921}
review:
Очень хотелось оценить игру положительно из-за понравившейся атмосферы, но это просто невозможно ввиду плохой проработки практически всех остальных аспектов игры.

Blood 2: The Chosen сильно проигрывает вышедшим в том же году Sin и Half-Life в плане сюжета и его подачи. Здесь он представлен в виде плохо поставленных катсцен на движке, а также небольших текстовых вставок на загрузочных экранах, которые часто исчезают после загрузки и не позволяют прочитать текст. Кроме того, вникнуть в происходящее мешает отсутствие субтитров и локализации, а пиратский русификатор только усугубляет дело.

Количество багов просто поражает, а для запуска на современном ПК придется попотеть. После постоянных вылетов на одном из боссов, игру хотелось снести и больше к ней не возвращаться.
ИИ противников слабый и ни в какое сравнение не идёт с HL и Unreal того же года. Но графика, левелдизайн и общая атмосфера со специфическим юмором получились в целом неплохими, несмотря на повторение некоторых уровней. Как и во многих шутерах конца 90-х, стрелять здесь довольно скучно, но стоит отметить возможность вести огонь по-македонски, что добавляет игре стиля, пусть это по большей части косметическая особенность  и каких-то особых ощущений не дает.

В целом, вторая часть производит впечатление посредственного шутера с большими техническими проблемами и однообразным геймплеем, который наскучивает уже после половины прохождения, хотя потенциал у игры определенно был.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120386189', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1582208599}
review:
Не советую. 
Игра которая продаётся здесь даже работать отказывается нормально.  При разрешении экрана выше 1280 на 720 экран выглядит как 320 на 230. К графике нет претензий она на год младше меня. Мало этого? Она у меня умудрялась вылетать целых два раза. 

Я поиграл в первый Blood не так давно и остался доволен, хоть сюжет был и не всегда понятен, да и был не особо важен в экшоне, то здесь я при запуске не понял как начать игру. В меню есть три режима Кошмар, Калеб и Избранный, ну я выбрал последний вариант, выбор персонажа и никаких заставок - поезд, в первой части хоть заставка была из которой была понятна завязка. 

Итог один : 
Когда-нибудь Стим станет проверять старые игры перед продажей, и не ждать что комьюнити будет их чинить. 
Когда? Никогда.

author: {'steamid': '76561198076574537', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 2811, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 769, 'last_played': 1579446748}
review:
Отличная игра с, как это часто бывает, плохой адаптацией.
Запускается не с первого раза, вылетает, глючит.
О самой игре.
Для своего времени движок был передовой. Её сравнивают с Duke Nukem, но в отличие от "Дюка", здесь противники и предметы объёмные, а не спрайтовые.
Игра довольно длинная, с лабиринтами, боссами и горой пасхалок (Спиди гонщик, Фредди Крюгер, Чужой, Хищник, Сияние, Секретные материалы, Бешеный Макс, Ярость и ещё многие, с первоисточником которых я не знаком).
Вся мебель и объекты разрушаемые. Кровища и расчленёнка. Следы от пуль не пропадают. Гильзы падают на пол (таким многие современные шутеры похвастать не могут, не то, что в 1999 году).
Стоит отметить большой выбор оружия: от ножа, до пушки, открывающей чёрную дыру.
Из минусов отмечу только крайнюю сложность в некоторых местах. Судя по прохождению от "Игромании", изначально такой сложности не было, так что это либо глюк, либо Steam опять что-то нахимичил.
Основной сюжет прошёл, принялся за "ночной кошмар". Будем надеяться, что дополнение не хуже оригинала.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014310895', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1565623460}
review:
Я НЕ РЕКОМЕНДУЮ ЭТУ ИГРУ ТЕМ, КТО ХОЧЕТ УВИДЕТЬ ЗДЕСЬ ПРОДОЛЖЕНИЕ ПЕРВОЙ ЧАСТИ. 

Конечно, здесь всё тот же Калеб, а также (внезапно) - Измаил, Офелия и Габриэлла (в первой части был Габриэль. Да, это всё тот же персонаж, только сменил пол. Почему? Чтобы лишний раз потоптаться на сюжете первой части. Других объяснений не вижу). Все эти персонажи в Blood 2 были воскрешены без понятных на то объяснений, так ещё и спустя 100 лет.

Если разработчики хотели дать возможность играть за нескольких персонажей, то могли бы создать абсолютно новых персонажей, а не тех, чьи смерти мы видели в кат-сценах ещё в первой части игры, а именно, напомню как это было:

1. Измаил - ещё в прологе был сожжён и съеден Цербером;
2. Офелия - была распята в первой главе, а после того, как гаргулья Чеог была убита, Калеб её сжёг;
3. Габриэль - был убит паучком и замурован в кокон. Калеб выпил его кровь, вытащил его сердце и съел. 

Я специально оставлю в своём профиле все кат-сцены из первой части Blood, дабы можно было во всём убедиться лично.

Blood 2 - своей судьбой напоминает фильм ужасов Halloween, когда сценаристы настолько загубили идею свою франшизы, доводя её до абсурда и нелепости, что те осознав, что они натворили, создали альтернативное продолжения, похоронив 3, 4, 5 и 6 части своего фильма. Того же хотелось бы и от Monolith Productions, - похороните сюжет Blood 2 и создайте третье, правильное продолжение Blood. Хотя... А стоит ли продолжать то, что уже было логический завершено? Очень сложный вопрос.

P.S. Эта игра по непонятным причинам отказывается запускаться из библиотеки стима. 
Под Windows 10 мне удалось в неё поиграть только запустив .exe файл в папке с игрой от имени администратора. Вот такие пироги.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999729102', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 425, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 374, 'last_played': 1706966343}
review:
Blood II jest grą, od której zaczęła się moja przygoda z FPS'ami. Jest to, jak na starsze gry wypada, bardzo rozbudowana pod względem map, broni, przeciwników przygoda, do której nawet dziś lubię powrócić. Gra ta graficznie co prawda odbiega od dzisiejszych standardów jednak klimat, który oferuje sprawia, że nie odrzuca i potrafi wciągnąć na nawet kilkadziesiąt godzin rozgrywki.
Zalety:
-czarny humor
-dużo przyjemnego strzelania
-ogromny arsenał różnorodnych broni
-elementy horroru
-poziom trudności
-dużo krwi ;)
-klimat
Wady:
-małe bugi z AI
-problemy z odpaleniem i płynnością gry na nowych systemach
Podsumowując Blood 2 to produkcja warta uwagi i polecam wszystkim, których naszła ochota na postrzelanie.
Moja ocena to 9.5/10

review:
What can I say. It's so raw it can still talk, fly and give relationship advice. Feels so rushed.

Getting it to work properly is bothersome but quick if you have a guide. Still crashes rarely. Gameplay not as bad (but not very good either) as the balance. Airplane level has barely any ways of healing so you gunna abuse the AI... Gore is way unrealistic. I wouldn't recommend playing this game on any other difficulty but 'Genocide' unless you're a hardcore Blood fan like me. It will only make a normal player disappointed and uninterested, but at least a Blood fan it will make us remember and appreciate the first game more. 

That being said, it still has content value, definitely. So much potential. Play on genocide, don't take it seriously and you should have fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561197976176572', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 323, 'playtime_forever': 1267, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1661059913}
review:
If you can get this game to work, you can enjoy one of the most lackluster sequels to one of the best classic shooters of all time!
[Pro-Tips: Set the game to 'Run as Administrator' & 'Win98 Compatibility Mode']

'Blood 2: The Chosen' takes place over 100 years in the future from the original, and the Tchernobog Cabal still thrives, now as a global megacorporate superpower -- CabalCo. -- under the auspices of a zealot named Gideon.  
Our protagonist, the undead gunfighter, Caleb, takes the fight up the corporate ladder to their leader -- reviving his old band of Chosen killers from their eternal slumber as he goes.  You can play the game as any of the characters, who all possess different abilities and stats, but only Caleb's playthrough has cutscenes.

Sad that this port didn't get any TLC from Atari -- the title would be fun to blast through for a lark with appropriate playability upgrades..
If you have nostalgia for it, you know what there is to enjoy, otherwise, it's kind of crappy and half-baked.

The franchise storyline is available here:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2397531551

author: {'steamid': '76561198102060990', 'num_games_owned': 235, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1622, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1592, 'last_played': 1705934557}
review:
Kontynuacja kultowego Blooda! W przeciwieństwie do poprzedniczki Blood 2 przenosi nas w pełne 3D. Ponownie wcielamy się w rolę Caleba, aby siać zniszczenie wśród demonów i kultystów sekty Cabalco. Akcja rozgrywa się około 100 lat po wydarzeniach z pierwszej części gry i toczy się w futurystycznym mieście opanowanym przez wyżej wspomnianą sektę, która teraz działa pod przykrywką globalnej korporacji. Rozgrywka jest krwawa, szybka i wciągająca. Zaletą gry jest fakt, że oprócz masakrowania przeciwników w iście finezyjnym stylu możemy także niszczyć większość obiektów znajdujących się w grze. Zróżnicowanie przeciwników jest zdumiewające jak na ówczesne czasy. Będziemy walczyć w agentami korporacji, komandosami, różnego typu demonami, a nawet kosmitami! Do tego dochodzą także starcia z bossami, którzy niestety bywają zbugowani i łatwo znaleźć sposób na pokonanie ich w dziecinnie prosty sposób. Arsenał broni jest jeszcze bardziej rozbudowany niż w przypadku poprzedniczki (a większość broni posiada alternatywny tryb ataku). Mamy nóż, pistolety, uzi, karabin szturmowy, laleczkę voodoo, spray na insekty, wyrzutnię napalmu, a to tylko namiastka dostępnych narzędzi zniszczenia. Poziomy także są zróżnicowane i choć czasami zdarzy nam się powrócić do poprzednich map to zmieniają się one wraz z naszymi postępami w grze. Grafika jest już mocno przestarzała, jednak jeżeli chodzi o moje osobiste zdanie to podoba mi się jej stylistyka. Muzyka także zasługuje jak najbardziej na plus. Oprócz podstawowej wersji gry dostajemy także dodatek Nightmare Levels, w którym wcielamy się w sprzymierzeńców Caleba i mamy okazję poznać uniwersum Blooda z nieco innej perspektywy. Nie zabrakło również czarnego humoru i słynnych komentarzy naszego protagonisty. Kolejnym atutem gry jest jej poziom trudności. Mamy do wyboru 3 warianty na łatwym gra rzeczywiście nie jest wymagająca i przechodzimy ją przysłowiowym spacerkiem, na trudnym zaś ciągle będziemy musieli kontrolować stan zdrowia i amunicji, gdyż tej będzie nam brakować niemalże przez całą grę. Alternatywą dla tych opcji jest tutaj oczywiście normalny poziom trudności, który rzeczywiście jest zgodny ze swoją nazwą. Gra jest w mojej opinii wystarczająco długa i powinna dać nam ponad 20 godzin świetnej zabawy.

Polecam tę grę wszystkim miłośnikom klasycznych gier FPS!

Zapraszam także do zapoznania się z moją recenzją owej gry w formie wideo: https://youtu.be/ipWLCIWJtuE

author: {'steamid': '76561198160207272', 'num_games_owned': 157, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 600, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 591, 'last_played': 1553526433}
review: At first I liked Blood II. First levels are certainly the best ones. Then you see repetitions and lack of good game design. You notice that your weapons feel awful, and some are useless (your rocket launcher is damages opponents worse than a shotgun), that enemies are either bullet sponges, or not a threat, you realize that sometimes it's better not to fight at all, just sprint around to the exit. Bosses are boring, challenges are either unfair (like with hitscanners that are obnoxious, or huge monsters that shoot rockets at you while you're in a corridor, and the splash damage can get around corners), plot is laughable, art design is just meh. Add constant bugs like getting killed by closing doors (yeah, you will be afraid of doors after that), unskippable cutscenes... And the list goes on. It's a bad game, and it always was one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052636113', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 242, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 239, 'last_played': 1593569010}
review:
Dissapointing and poorly tested. Blood I was tons of fun, and this 3D game is exasperating in difficulty. Weapon damage is poorly calibrated. Even cannons or plasma launchers won't make too much damage while some enemies can receive a ridiculous amount. A hit with the plasma balls, blackholes and cannon shells are equivalent to a shot with 2 shotguns. Some enemies that can grab you to death and there is no way to get free from their grip will appear hidden in corners to guarantee they catch you. Weapons from enemies make a LOT of damage to you...

Leaving aside that you need the VgVoodoo card emulator to play on Win 7 and beyond, the game itself is a collection of bad practices. Only entertaining if you play in God mode (cheatcode MPGOD). Not a worthy sucessor. I remembered it bad, but playing it now made it worse.

Enemy animations are nice. Some scenarios look good. But that's it. You are always low on ammo because most enemies are like mammoths

4/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198043782587', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 598, 'playtime_forever': 910, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 910, 'last_played': 1550709249}
review:
I expected game to be deeply flawed but have a potential. To have fun levels but bad balancing. After all, it has at least some positive reviews and some that love it, albeit it has to do with playing it with childhood.
But alas, it seems that all that a game is required to get "not so bad, check it out" nowadays is not to crash on startup and be somewhat old. Looking at you, ten thousand retro reviewers on YouTube.

Because boy, this one has no potential. It's a drab, bland, worthless waste of time. And no, I am not going to include things like "that one weapon looks fancy" because it's just crumbs and bits over one plain wood disguised as a pie. I mean, there are pretty much no levels that were worth playing. Gone all the fancy gothic and inspired mazes. Now we have completely bland and uninspired places like subway. And subway again. Bland. Endlessly bland sewers with no soul. There is only one spot where game more or less remembers that it's supposed to have inspirations, apartment where it references The Shining and boy, it sticks out like a sore thumb compared to everything else.
Even gore sucks and has no feels. Neither do controls and physics this time.

Sure there are many bland shooters that don't try to be anything more than grey corridors but it's supposed to be a sequel to one of the more creative non-realistic ones. BOO!

It also tries to have plot but it's just trash and rash as it doesn't care. Not even enough to make it entertaining, it's just confusing mess of who cares and who CARES.

And that's not mentioning the balancing. Boy. It either does stupid-hitscan dumb sentries that disguise as enemy humans or just BSy monsters. The former, yea, the AI in this game is so dumb that they overcompensate that with reaction, accuaricy and damage. When you fight humans, which you will do a lot, you don't feel like you fight humans, it doesn't feel tactic. You just feel that you got into poison gas zone and you have to just shoot the source of it real fast while losing HP anyway. And yea, I heard that Easy difficulty is too easy and Normal is too hard, so good luck. It doesn't even provide health powerups as much because killing enemies may spawn one. But it's randomized and has a low chance so good luck with having a good time. And monsters are just bulletsponges, often placed in tight corridors while controls of this game suck unlike Blood 1. At some point I realized that it's better to just run past every monster. Less of waste of time and effort and ammo.

I mean, how come this true-3D game somehow has worse explosions than "dat fake 3D" Build engine original... Because here the splash damage of explosions passes through level geometry. Who thought it's okay?! What a devolution.

Bosses suck too. Final boss should be seen to be believed of how awful designed it is. The only tactic of which is to sit behind rock and shoot booooollets at that FAT. It's like they forgot that player is supposed to be intellectually challenged (even if it's for a spine brain and small-time tactics of avoiding things) and thus have fun.

The only thing I liked is how infighting is handled between monsters and human enemies that fight each other as soon as they see each other. Unlike other 90s shooters they don't decide that you are priority number 1 for the rest of their life just because you shot a single bullet when these two groups are present, they kinda prioritise on who is too dangerously closer.

Overall, Blood 2 The Chosen is a complete waste of my time and I hate it. After beating it there was nothing that I could say was worth playing.

Okay, almost, it includes The Nightmares addon. Playing it was like getting a bucked of cold icey water over my burning soul of hate (yep, because I value my time). It actually had creativity and soul put into it. An inspiration. Levels with great ideas going behind them, where each of the four heroes tell their little tale in various locations. Sadly, it's still flawed balance-wise and it's way too short. But at least it's something after an awful base game.

And yea, you can make the game run properly. Just use a fancy Steam community guide that has high-resolution patches and dgVoodoo2 wrapper.

author: {'steamid': '76561198124250507', 'num_games_owned': 278, 'num_reviews': 139, 'playtime_forever': 583, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 583, 'last_played': 1549439427}
review:
[h1]Blood II: The Chosen + Expansion[/h1]

[u]Pontos Positivos[/u]

+ Boa variedade de armas e inimigos.
+ Ambientes decentes (na maioria das vezes).
+ Trilha sonora decente.
+ Boa duração (em torno de 8 horas para a campanha e 1 hora para a expansão [i]The Nightmare Levels[/i], ambas na dificuldade "Homicide").

[u]Pontos Negativos[/u]

- Gameplay ruim devido ao dano das armas ser muito inconsistente e explosões atravessarem paredes.
- Batalhas contra chefes ruins.
- Variedade de ambientes baixa.
- Crashes são muito frequentes.
- A expansão [i]The Nightmare Levels[/i] é ruim e não possui nada notável.
- Alguns patches são necessários para jogar de maneira semi-decente. Eu recomendo seguir [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=498599858]esse guia[/url].

[h1]Resumo[/h1]

[i]Blood II: The Chosen[/i] é decepcionante e incompleto. Enquanto [i]Blood[/i] possuia uma dificuldade justa (na dificuldade "Lighly Broiled"), esse jogo é simplesmente quebrado. Os inimigos mais simples podem morrer com uma facada ou com 3 tiros de sniper, hitscanners possuem um tempo de reação e precisão divina, e um dos piores problemas: explosões atravessam paredes. Isso torna o jogo muito desbalanceado, e em certas partes fugir dos inimigos é a única alternativa caso não queira desperdiçar sua munição. Os ambientes não são ruins, mas muitos se repetem. O primeiro mapa, o trem, se repete 3 vezes durante a campanha, as únicas diferenças são os inimigos, e o fato de que na terceira vez são dois trens. As batalhas contra chefes são desbalanceadas, e 3 chefes (incluindo o chefe final) usam variações do mesmo ataque. Em todas as batalhas você fica à mercê da sorte, exceto uma (C2L9), que é simplesmente entediante. Além de tudo isso o jogo tem problemas de compatibilidade. Crashes são frequentes, e mesmo com patches o FPS é instável. Uma das únicas partes decentes do jogo além da trilha sonora é a variedade de inimigos e armas, e mesmo assim não há nada memorável. [i]Blood II: The Chosen[/i] foi lançado incompleto graças à [i]GT Interactive[/i] (hoje [i]Atari Inc.[/i]), que em uma única decisão matou a franquia e sujou a reputação da [i]Monolith Productions[/i]. Fique longe desse jogo.

[b]Diga se a review foi útil ou não, e se não foi, comente por que. Eu Agradeço.[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198002551061', 'num_games_owned': 343, 'num_reviews': 158, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1613531033}
review:
(mini-review).

The graphics are attrocious.  The cut scenes are laughable.  And yet, as a nostalgia piece from the late 1990s, Blood II: The Chosen is a stark example of everything that's missing in today's shooter landscape.  Originally released by Monolith in 1998, complete with singleplayer, multiplayer and a fleshed-out DLC, Blood 2 had a gory and brutal campaign, even by today's lax standards.  The game follows the protagonist: Caleb, an immortal native american half-breed who possesses the powers of Chernobog, a dark godlike entity that was disposed of during the first game of the series.  You're opposed this time, by Chernobog's greatest disciple: Gideon, who now has a megacorporation at his beck and call.  Unlike other shooters, every individual and entity within this game is a psychotic monster that preys on the witless chattle of the world.  You replenish your health by consuming the hearts of your enemies and even the heroes are cold, narcissistic animals.  With grungy, dark music, a twisted world possessed by genetic freak shows and evil spirits and akimbo shooting play, Blood 2 was an impossibly dark yet compelling shooter that represented what was best about the frenetic end of the millennium gaming landscape.  

Only one question remains... "How do you like your flesh cooked?"

Recommended.
8.5/10.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TMRdxJUSQ8E&index=5&list=PLA62E484F1149383C

author: {'steamid': '76561198038140483', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 254, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1675533342}
review:
Ótimo. Excelente game, na sua época obviamente. Indispensável se você almeja uma carreira de game designer, pois assim como os outros games dessa época (Quake, Duke Nukem e Halo mais posteriormente), possui ótimo level design e jogabilidade clássica. Seu motor já é o LithTech, feito pela própria desenvolvedora (Shadow of Mordor usa heheh). Possui bugs em computadores atuais, então não espere comprar e sair rodando numa boa, o game é antigo, porém excelente, e como na vida real, respeite os mais velhos. Procure por configs e faça vários testes de driver de vídeo nele antes de começar a jogar pra valer, para você ter uma experiência agradável. Assim como o primeiro game, seu estilo de arte é único, sombrio e muito divertido. Possui enredo, falas, uma história conectada ao primeiro e tudo mais. Combinação perfeita de terror e elementos sci-fi / cyberpunk.

Como jogador destas belezinhas desde sempre, defendo que o primeiro game é melhor, mas este não pode ser dispensado de forma alguma. Se você acha esse game muito estranho e fora do padrão do primeiro, saiba que ele acontece um século depois, 1928 -> 2028.

Meu tempo de jogo aqui não mostra o quanto eu já joguei realmente fora da Steam, antigamente.

Quero deixar bem claro que este não é um game FPS pra geração Nutella - Overwatch / CoD WW2 jogar. Muito, mas muito diferente ahuahsuhauhs. Mas se quiser... bom, seja bem vindo ao maravilhoso mundo do FPS clássico. (pfv procure Quake aqui na Steam primeiro kkkkkk)

 10/10 - Eu

author: {'steamid': '76561198414350299', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 599, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 365, 'last_played': 1582706692}
review:
ok reasonable game with mild to average storyline. The weapons are a lot of fun and thus far into chapter 2 i have found roughly 13 or so weapons. The weapons are pretty fun however if you chose to dual weild some of the lesser weapns it seems you can no longer use secondary fire modes which is lame. The enemies i have found so far break into about 9 different types give or take with varying skills and abilities. The thing about the enemies that annoys me however is they are a bit op even on easy, the weapons used by the enemies within the game so long as they arent bullet based (eg handguns, uzi, assault rifle) can even affect you behind solid cover. So this means you have to get out of range entirely as the blast radius goes through solid walls. Map layout is enjoyable with more than a few interesting and gory features although i dont really understand why there is a use button as it seems almost all the interaction is automatic except for doors. The early maps in chapter one are frustrating as certain features that would make solving issues such as where to go are blurry due to average graphics. Now i know this was made in the 90's but its predecessor using a lesser graphics setting could convey it clearly. the game is fun across the board although it still has a few programing errors such as
-spawning errors where characters spawn near the roof
-sudden shutdown of game
-occasional random lagging with multiple character spawning that continues throughout session
-game freeze that basically cuts you off from using your computer(had to restart computer as the game wouldnt let task manager be displayed)
-doors killing you in cutscenes

author: {'steamid': '76561198129936651', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 477, 'playtime_forever': 1361, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1318, 'last_played': 1520203989}
review:
Blood II: The Chosen + Expansion is such a disappointment of a game, but let’s tell the story.

The year is 2028 and Caleb the man from the first game has spent the last century since killing the dread demon Tchernobog in trying to bring back his comrades, the Chosen, who were killed by the evil god. 

But even with the evil Tchernobog dead the Cabal, the ones who used to worship him are still around. Since there master’s death at the hands of Caleb, the Cabal has turned their cult into a global mega-corporation called CabalCo in hopes to restore Tchernobog and destroy Caleb.

But not if Caleb has a say in it, now Caleb must fight the Cabal and there leader Gideon but there is something even worse than the Cabal that is coming, but can Caleb stop this new evil ?

All right now what is good about this game, well the updated Graphics where cool. Now to me I don’t really care about that, but it was a nice update from the first game.

And like with the first game the levels were well made and gives us some unique place’s to see. But not as much as the first game. The new weapons we got were fun to use. 

But the best in the game were all the easter eggs/nods to some movies and the first game and some other stuff.

All right now for the bad. The game crashes a lot you can still play it but even if you turn the graphics all the way down it still crashes, some people have said that it is because it’s an older game and call bull-crap on that.

Why well the first game is just as old and to me it did not have a crashing problem like this game hell some other old games I have played did not have a crashing problem like this, I mean they did have their bugs but not like this. 

You can still play this game, but the crashes are really annoying. Then there are the bosses some of them are very frustrating to fight the worst ones being the Cathedral boss, the final boss and the final boss in the Nightmare level.

They have attacks you can’t doge like the Cathedral boss’s laser attack or the final boss’s laser attack. Or the homing attack by the final boss in the Nightmare level.

And there attacks can be way over powered were in just a few seconds your dead. Hell some of the enemies can feel that way too. Then there is the A.I it’s just really pathetic and sometimes buggy like one enemy just being/hovering on top head. 

And there is the new enemy the bone leeches just like with the hand enemy that chokes you to death these guys darn your life. 

But why are they bad you may ask? Well the choking hand enemies are in this game; I mean why have these bone leeches in this game when you still keep the choking hand enemies from the first game and they both do the same thing.

Last thing the story leave’s a good bit unanswered. [spoiler] like how did the three chosen come back to life? There were all killed in the first how are back? And then there Gabriel who was a man then becomes a girl called Gabriella and they don’t say how. 

Then there this doctor that works for Gideon and we don’t know jack all about him other than he is an evil doctor. [/spoiler]

So with all that said this game is really a disappointment it had a lot of potential but bugs the bosses the A’I and some of the Story really just sucked. So I can’t really recommend this game even if you are a fan of the first one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198098563486', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 202, 'playtime_forever': 1393, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 954, 'last_played': 1519943968}
review:
Blood 2 is a very interesting game. It's very flawed, broken and it was cleary rushed but it's still fun to play and has a fare number of things working for it despite being a doomed production from the start

Pros
Most of the weapons are fun to use
It has a huge arsenol of weapons
Even though the expansion pack is short it's still fun and included for free plus considering the default price is $4.99 I'd say this is forgivable in this version of the game
Now the Lithtech enginge may not look the pretiest but it has wonderful gore effects if it moves it'll blow up into bits of flesh and blood
It's cool to have extra playable charectors with advantages/disadvantages 
Just like the last game this one is filled with refferences to horror and pop culture one of my favorites would be the "got blood" billboard
The level descriptions/objectives have a lovely sense of humor
The soundtracks awesome
You can hear Calobs magical voice anytime you want with the tap of a button

Cons
Now you can dualwield weapons as long as you want but then their alternate fire modes don't work which does suck but this is realy only a big deal for the flare gun and sawed-off shotgun
I couldn't get the remote detonated bombs to work
This game is buggy there were a few instances were an invisible wall kept me from progressing but these moments were rare
This game can be way to dark either you can see or it's pitchblack and the flashlight is almost uselesss and the night vission goggles were completly useless 
It's cool how this game has plenty of secrets to find but the level design is generaly linear combine that with how dark it can get and you may feel discouraged to explore
The difficulty modes are kindof broken Genocide is super easy Homicide can be pretty hard and Suicide is well ludicris the biggest problem is that none of these come off as a Normal mode its either too easy or to hard
This game does crash on rare ocasions but it still happens 

Despite its many flaws I can honnestly still reccomend this game its a mess but it's still fun to shoot goons and monsters as Calob with Lithtech gore effects

review: Народ, если вы тоже хотели опробовать сиквел BLOOD по причине того, что вам нравится первая часть- ЗАБУДЬТЕ! Я тоже сначала решил опробовать сиквел, ибо я пропустил его в своё время. Сначала всё выглядело неплохо и я непонимал почему все хаят на игру. Но потом начался уровень в самолете и это было начало конца. Тогда я уже видел её главные недостатки: там уже были проблемы с хп и мне пришлось сидеть за укрытиями по кд, и сохранятся после каждого убитого врага; дизайн всё был более запутаным и скучным и понять куда идти было очень трудно. Но я решил дать игре шанс, думал, что это будет только на этом уровне. Ага, щас. Дальше ничего не изменилось. Вообщем, из плюсов можно выделить только пару вещей: 1)Калеб всё ещё харизматичен и крут; 2) Саунд тут по прежнему топовый;3)Отсылок всё так же дохера. Но вот минусы их перечёркивают более чем полностью: 1)Сломаный баланс; 2)Кривой левел и геймдизайн;3)Отвратительная стрельба. Вообщем, купите первую часть и даже не думайте пробовать сиквел.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993393035', 'num_games_owned': 1187, 'num_reviews': 134, 'playtime_forever': 683, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 683, 'last_played': 1514041919}
review:
Кровавый сборник багов и дисбаланса . 

Blood 2 - продолжение прекраснейшего шутера Blood , который отличился :  отличнейшим юмором/отсылками  , отменным  арсеналом ( каждый ствол был актуален в течение всей игры ) и врагами , атмосферными локациями и тонной крови 

Сабж же - растерял практически все . 

Начну с плюсов : 
1. Локаций довольно много и пара уровней меня лично смогли зацепить ( хоть и не обошлось без надоевших складов , канализаций ) . 
2. Врагов можно легко обработать до мяса . 
3. Калеб все-ещё не чурается убивать невинных людей ради сердец :) 

Минусов больше : 

0. Сюжет может и неплохой , но его подача .. Ужасные кат-сцены вкупе с плохой игрой актёров ( кроме голоса Калеба )  убивают все погружение в историю .
1. Воз и маленькая телега багов . Все перечислять не буду , но один враг может запрыгнуть на вас и начать крутиться , а 2 босс игры тупо застревал на месте и терпеливо ждал смерти . 
2. В игре много оружия , но носить вы можете 10 и некоторые пушки используют один и тот же тип боеприпасов ( к примеру - пистолеты , Узи и автомат с подствольником ) . + не сказать , чтобы они различались по урону . Поэтому вы будете использовать только 2-3 полезных ствола из всего многообразия арсенала ( бесполезного ) . 
3. Бестиарий . Перекаченные амбалы с трубами , амбалы с атакой фаерболами , летающие амбалы и куча однотипных солдат . На мой взгляд , в первой игре враги были колоритнее ( даже банальные зомби ) .
4. Разброс пуль . Иногда , одна пуля из пистолета может убить солдата . Но чаще всего - 15-20 .  К врагам это не относится - они с 99,99% в вас попадут и снесут за 2-3 секунды . Это убивает ,,динамику,, и превращает игру в ,,сел за угол , немного высунулся , увидел пытку врага - стреляешь ,, . 
5. Боссы - они унылые и до жути дисбалансные ( особенно 1 босс , атака которого убьёт вас на любом расстояние , если вы не будете стоять за его спиной . Ну и последний - которые своим лучом может вас ваншотнуть . Это не сложность , а тупость . 
6. Исчезла  атмосфера Америки 20-30 годов прошлого столетия . И хоть это можно оправдать временным скачком на 100 лет вперед ( относительно первой игры )  , но для меня это небольшой минус . 


Нейтральный фактор : враги иногда высирают сердца/лечилки при смерти . Awesome . 

Итог : не рекомендую этот шутер никому . Черт знает , почему Монолит выдали такое ( их последующие игры вполне отличные - Fear , Tron 2.0 , NOLF 1-2 ) , но Blood 2 - ужасный сиквел и плохой шутер . 

P.S. 4.5 сердца из 10 .

review:
Blood II: The Chosen - отзывается в моём сердце с самого детства. Это были счастливые времена пеньков и школьных будней :) Спасибо родителям, за то, что однажды на митинском рынке купили копию игры! На обложке CD-диска был изображён какой - то грозный азиат с крашеными волосами. Я ещё тогда задумывался: а неужели вот так вот на самом деле выглядит Калеб, и всю первую серию прятался под маской с широкой шляпой, и пальто? Но к счастью - всё обошлось! :) В игре Нас ждёт тот самый Калеб из легендарного Blood. А ещё "We are the Cabal"!

Спустся 15 лет, я с огроным удовольствием перепрошёл игру, и берусь проходить бонусные эпизоды, которые никогда не видел ранее. Любителям хардкорного олдскула - рекомендую!

author: {'steamid': '76561197981934486', 'num_games_owned': 329, 'num_reviews': 132, 'playtime_forever': 733, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 733, 'last_played': 1501596147}
review:
Put simply, this game's sale price, one or two weapons and about 2 or 3 levels are its only saving grace. If you can get it to run at all, of course. I'm not the type of person that gives a thumbs down for nothing, so I'll delve a little deeper.

Before I go on, a word of warning: this game is wildly unstable and hard to get up-and-running properly. This is also one of the main reasons I gave it a thumbs down, it's just too damn unstable, even with all the patches, fixes and running it at 1366x768 if you have a 16:9 monitor, it's the only resolution that looks good and runs relatively well, anything above 1000px in height crashes every third quickload.

But let's say you got it to run, so what are you getting? As far as presentation goes, it's dated, but not entirely garbage. The weapon models are done alright, the character models not so much, but the enemies some of the environments are what stood out to me. The sound design is also pretty good, music is minimal but effective in helping the visuals set a really dark/gloomy atmosphere, the weapons sound really good too. The problem is, they only sound good.

The weapons in this game, while cool on paper, are the most puny, unimpactful pieces of trash I've ever seen in an FPS game, which is a shame, because in the original Blood, the enemies were tough, but the guns packed a punch hard enough to balance it out. Here, the vast majority of enemies take A LOT of ammo to kill. For example, there are these bug-like creatures that take 70 assault rifle rounds to kill. EACH. Granted, you can carry 500 rounds, but what the hell does that help if there's 3 of them along with some other (even tougher) enemy types, that maybe take 100 assault rifle rounds and 20 Tesla charges to kill? The Tesla cannon is the only weapon with some semblance of punch, but ammo for it is scarce. The Napalm launcher has been neutered to the point of insignificance. It simply kils nothing. Weak. I don't know if this is a problem with the actual weapon damage or the enemy hitboxes, but the bottom line is that the way the guns and enemies work together SUCKS. The only cool weapon is the Hook thing you get in the Nightmare levels, which spawns portals that shoot out chained hooks that pull the enemy towards said portal; if you spawn enough of them, the sorry sack of meat to end up in its grasp will literally by ripped apart slowly. Cool stuff. Why not more of that and less generic, bulletchomping crud?

I think the main problem with this game is simply that it's artificially difficult to the point of ridiculousness; unfair, cheap, and most importantly, not fun, 80% of the time. I'm not new to 90s FPS games (in fact, if you have a quick look at my library, you'll see that it's pretty much the bulk of what I play) and I completed the first Blood, but this game is just... frustrating. Most enemies are (as mentioned) bullet sponges, hit-scanning enemies have an accuracy so high that two of them will get you from 200HP to 34HP in a matter of seconds, hard-hitting projectile enemies are often spawned in small areas with no way to dodge the projectiles or even the splash damage, ammo is distributed poorly, health even more so, the boss battles suck (especially the Nightmare boss) etc. It doesn't click, most of the time is what I'm saying.

I could go on and on about this but let me just use the Behemoth enemy type as an example. It's the boss of chapter two. I had to empty 100 sniper bullets and the ENTIRETY of my Tesla cannon to defeat it. In chapter 3, it's a fairly common enemy type, and it's not even one bit weaker, not to mention the game often spawns two at a time. Sure, they infight with other enemies, but you're still wasting massive resources to defeat an enemy which ultimately doesn't even need defeating because you can just run past it. In general, the balance of resources vs. enemies that good FPS titles like DOOM, Quake, Shadow Warrior, Duke Nukem, the first Blood etc. got down to a tee is completely absent here. I literally speedran/skipped upwards of 2/3 of a level because I just couldn't be bothered to stand there and pump hundreds and hundreds of rounds into these tenacious wastes of disk space. Let me illustrate the situation: in the penultimate level, the game spawns three of these large, tough and powerful Lich-like enemies into a narrow-ish corridor. They fire napalm-like fireballs with huge splash damage and you have nowhere to dodge. Hm, should i just... run past and avoid them completely or use up all my hard-earned ammo so that I'm left ammo-less for the sure-to-follow boss encounter?

There is a forgettable and rushed story in there somewhere, but the voice acting is bad (even Caleb's voice actor, who is excellent, has some downright cringy moments), the villain is an annoying, pompous tw4t, the Chosen are about the least memorable crew I can think of. The expansion is less than two hours and has the most lazy writing I've seen in a while and the most annoying boss in the entire game (who the hell makes a boss that shoots undodgeable homing projectiles?). The only way I could beat it without cheats is to literally get it stuck in the world geometry and hold LMB until the thing dropped and I had the intense satisfaction of listening to Gideon's disgusting voice narrate the end of this nightmare.

That's not to say this game is ALL bad. It has a vibe that really hadn't been done before and honestly hasn't been done since. The controls are great and smooth, as they should be for a 90s FPS, the levels are non-linear and the architecture is, for the most part, well designed (even though some levels like the subway train or Cabalco offices are lazily re-used up to THREE times), and in terms of actual good gameplay; what about the other 20 or so percent that ARE fun? Well, the gore system and gibbing in this game is immensely satisfying, when everything clicks, it's pure 90s FPS mayhem as it should be, but this is sadly so rare that I can just barely state these moments exist.

All-in-all, unless you're a die-hard Monolith fan (which I can't blame you, they made much better things than this disappointment) or you find the prospect of bulletsponge enemies and frequent crashing fun, I'm having a hard time recommending this game, even if it does cost 1.5€ during sales. If it ran properly, I'd probably give it a "barely recommend" and just caution everyone to be aware of it's questionable design and cheapness, but since it's also a buggy mess, I just can't recommend it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987175590', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 202, 'playtime_forever': 1104, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1104, 'last_played': 1501000423}
review:
[h1]!!Important note!![/h1]

I am running windows 7 on my computer and let me tell you, this game crashes a lot.  People have even said that they can't get this game running on a windows 10 computer.  Just be aware of this if you consider buying the game.   


[u]What I liked about the game[/u] 
[list]
[*]	The game still has that sense of humour the first game had.

[*]	You can play has four different characters, although I would of liked to of seen the characters abilities when choosing. 

[*]	Awesome boss fights, especially the last one.

[*]	Some of the weapons were good; like the singularity gun, minigun, and napalm gun. 

[*]	Some of the levels were alright like the human slaughter house and the campus from the expansion pack, but still they had so much more potential.

[*]	Alright soundtrack. 

[*]	It has some little things that I liked from the first game; like being able to kick severed head and being able to restore your health using people's hearts.

[*]  Plenty of gore and dismemberment    

[u]What I disliked or was disappointed with[/u]

[*]	Boring levels; which is a shame because the first game had some really memorable levels like; Dark Carnival and Phantom express. Some of the levels I felt were a great idea, but they could of been done better; for example when you stubble into a human slaughter house and the school campus from the expansion pack. 

[*]	Some ugly looking weapons; like the pistol, assault rifle, and flare gun. They have also replaced the pitchfork with a boring looking knife. The weapons don't have much of a kick compared to the first game; I was very disappointed with the explosives, because they weren't as effective as they were in the first game.  

[*]	Too many nuisance enemies (hand, leech, and spider). 

[*]	 No cleverly hidden secrets; I remember in the first game you could interact with a piano and a secret hatch would open. I felt the game needed more references to horror films. 

[*]	You can't interact with things (except levers and doors). I remember in the first game you could interact with the mirror and Caleb would say something. 
[*]	Enemies aren't particularly interesting, although the undead monks from the first game make a comeback in the expansion pack, which is pretty cool. Some parts of the levels you will find yourself just running through them, because the later enemies are just bullet sponges and deal a ton of damage; you do it to save ammo. 

[*]	The A.I of the civilians is just terrible. 

[*]	Playing the game on normal, is like playing it on hard.          
[/list]
[u]Conclusion[/u]  

Very disappointing; the game feels rushed. Not a patch on the first game, even the games expansion isn't as good as the expansions from the first game; like Cryptic passage or plasma pak. If I were you I would give this game a miss or wait till the game is heavily discounted; it's not worth the hassle. So much potential and so much wasted. After playing Shadow Warrior (2013), wolfenstein new order, and Doom (2016), I think now would be the perfect time to do a remake or a new game for the blood series; Plezzzzzzz. 

[h1]4/10[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198012461973', 'num_games_owned': 587, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 1202515, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 59493, 'last_played': 1676704739}
review:
This is a bad game compared to the first Blood, which is a masterpiece. I like some of their ideas (for example seeing the city at night from the elevator in Chapter 1, and the feeling of being a fugitive walking in dark alleyways between buildings during the night, hearing police sirens, that sort of thing), but the execution was bad. This one has many faults, for example you can glitch through boxes, sounds are awful (weapon sounds, Caleb burn sound, the cultist saying Pestis Cruento in the Cathedral sounds like he's retarded etc), the choking hands were replaced (not entirely, they are still present but introducing the Bone Leech was not needed) (you meet them again in C2L9) with HL-like headcrabs called the Bone Leech (they even introduced vortigaunt-like monsters called Shikari), AI is stupid (you can just run past them if you want and if you're at 0HP they will ignore you until you use a healthpack, also if one of them is in the way while you're being shot at they will hit and kill each other), weapons feel so weak (if you want easy kills, preemptive shooting FTW in this game). Everything that was good, no more. 
One thing that I must praise is the soundtrack though (look for Blood II: The Chosen OST - Ancient One Combat II on YouTube and tell me: isn't that awesome?). Then there's also the visual effects: when you shoot flare guns on enemies on a dark corridor and everything lights up red - that looks awesome (test it in C3L3: Temple of Poon when you get upstairs).
Also, elevators that go down to water? Enemies with crowbars? It's clear that they tried to copy Half-Life, and perhaps a few others as well, like Realms of the Haunting (Shikari looks and sounds so much like monsters from ROTH), Doom (keycards, seriously? Skull, dagger, etc keys were iconic in Blood; the flloating chasing heads are also copy-pasted from Doom) and Quake. Come to think of it, even the train areas look like that Duke Nukem 3D level (Metro Mayhem), but that may be a bit stretched (Caleb saying Groovy also reminds me of DN3D).. (maybe even Postal; especially the Nightmare loading screens) Do I need to continue?
However, what I liked was the Nightmare expansion levels (praised be the level designers), they are a nice throwback to the original maps, particularly C5L1 and C5L3, which resemble the original E2M3 (and E2M9 at the beginning) and E1M4, respectively. I absolutely love the Nightmare levels. Revisiting the ice mountains was so cool. C5L4 is E2M5. Also Ophelia in C5L2... (even the Cathedral in the main game resembles E1M6 The Great Temple from Blood 1, and part of Chapter 2 resembles E3M3: Raw Sewage. C2L3's bridge resembles the bridge and area from Blood's E1M6. Climbing on boxes in C2L4 reminded me of Blood 1's E2M2: The Lumber Mill), and the same level (C2L4) in the Processing Plant area also reminded me (because of the oven that you can go through and the 3 temperature readers nearby) of E1M1 and E1M3's ending (maybe even E3M5), and going through the red meat remains reminded me of E3M2 and perhaps some other original levels as well. Next up is C2L5 (this level gets the award for crashiest level), I like that they built a wrong way to go on the train tracks, reminescent of E1M2. C2L6 (I had to restart it because all the switches were already triggered therefore it was bugged) reminds me of E1M6, and maybe its water areas remind me a little bit of the dam reservoir/water areas from E3M6. I think C2L9 is meant to represent E2M8 at night, but it doesn't have the same feeling. C3L3: Temple of Poon is somewhat reminescent of E1M6 at first, that's probably the paintings and corridors, then becomes clear it's E1M6 with a strong hint of E2M7 - Bowels of the Earth. C3L4: Cabalco Enterprises looks like E3M4: The Sick Ward (closest), E4M9: Mall of the Dead or E2M4 The Overlooked Hotel's interior. C3L5: Power Station reminds me of E3M6's grey corridors. C4L1 is obviously meant to remind us of the Shial fight in E2M8; after the fight, during the chaos, it might resemble E4M5..
Still, not enough Blood 1 references and B1 style "secrets": no cracks in the walls to blow it up with TNT (replaced by fire extinguishers now)? No cash register secrets in shops? No creepy paintings that keep changing into evil faces? No creepy statues that move their eyes depending on where you are (I know why that happened in the first game, but it could've been done here as well). No scary ghosts (phantasms) (they could've worked perfectly in C3L7 instead of patients)? No bookcase secrets? No gargoyles disguised as statues? Seriously?
If you want to buy a Blood game but you're not sure which one to choose, my suggestion would be: buy the original one. It's worth it, trust me.
Btw, there is a widescreen patch, make sure you get it.  Also you might want to get the Extra Crispy mod.
Every year (well almost) there's a Halloween MP event for this game, if you're interested head over to the Transfusion forums and ask around.

Must know: If you get poor performance, you need dgVoodoo.
Oh, and did I mention how much it crashes? Don't sneeze or the game will crash. SAVE often! (It even crashed during AGDQ 2018 haha)

"They just don't make them like they used to" - Caleb
My favorite level is C3L3: Temple of Poon. After C3L3 things start to get interesting (finally, after so many boring levels). I liked the Mad Scientist, he's funny.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998538987', 'num_games_owned': 1074, 'num_reviews': 231, 'playtime_forever': 437, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 437, 'last_played': 1498982036}
review:
A Monolith a kilencvenes évek végén és a kétezres évek első felében igazán produktív volt és több féle játékkoncepcióval is kísérleteztek. Ezek közül a legnevesebbek talán a Shogo, No One Lives Forever, Tron 2.0 és a Blood voltak. Az első rész nekem kifejezetten tetszett a maga sötét, kultista világával, és valami hasonlót vártam a második résztől is, de már azelőtt hallottam a vészharangok kongását, mielőtt feltelepítettem volna a játékot. Egy igazán hánytatott sorsú, elhamarkodott döntések áldozata lett a Blood 2, amely a Shogo árnyékában lassan, de biztosan az elenyészet áldozatává vált. Ezért is sajnálom, mert nekem az első rész igazán kellemes felüdülés volt, és így végigjátszva a második részt azt kell mondjam, rosszabbra számítottam. De ne kanyarodjunk el a tényektől. A Blood 2 nem egy problémamentes játék. Közel sem az. Caleb mellett immáron három másik, a Kiválasztott karaktert is irányíthatunk, de azt fontos megjegyezni, hogy a történet csak akkor halad a normális medrében, ha Caleb-bel játszunk. Ez alatt azt kell érteni, hogy minden átvezető és konkrét bossharcok hiányoznak a játékból, ha nem a főszereplővel kezdünk neki a játéknak. És igazából nem is indokolja sok minden ezt a döntést, mert csupán képességeikben térnek el az egyes karakterek (egyik gyorsabban mozog, másik több sebzést képes elviselni, ilyen alap dolgokra kell gondolni)

Másik részről pedig  a történet olyan szinten egysíkű és érdektelen, hogy ha nem lenne is ugyan mindegy lenne. A 90-es évekre jellemző Run n' Gun stílusú játék a Blood 2 is és ez nem csak a pálya, de a játékdizájnban is meglátszik. Elsősorban azt sérelmeztem, hogy a játék stílusa majdhogynem vett egy 180 fokos fordulatot. Az első részre jellemző, hidegrázó helyeket leváltották a kisstílű, gengszterfilmekre hajazó sötét, szűk sikátorok, aluljárók és csatornák, melyektől teljesen olyan érzésem volt, mint ha egy Penge film díszletei közé csöppentem volna. Másrészt viszont kérdéses, hogy mennyire lett volna okos dolog újra felhasználni az első rész helyszíneit, bár a The Nightmare Levels című kiegészítővel ezt megtették. Igaz egy-két pálya erejéig megfordulunk régi romos templomokban és katakombákban, de szerintem több ehhez hasonló pálya kellett volna a játékba. És ugye akkor még nem is beszéltem arról, hogy a fejlesztők előszeretettel használtak fel újra már meglévő pályaelemeket annyi különbséggel, hogy második, vagy harmadik alkalommal már egy olyan szakaszon kell továbbhaladnunk, ami ezelőtt zárva volt. Nem tudom, hogy ez csupán a készítők lustaságát fedi, vagy egyszerűen a megsürgetett fejlesztés következménye, de amikor már a negyedik alkalommal lövöm szét ugyan azt a metrókocsit, kissé kezd elveszíteni a hangulatából.

És akkor vannak itt még egyéb, a játékmenetet befolyásoló problémák is, amelyek bizony képesek csúnyán megbélyegezni a játék renoméját. Kezdjük a legnyilvánvalóbbal, a mesterséges intelligenciával, ami olyan segg hülye, hogy egy tyúkot valószínűleg hamarabb tanítanék meg kötéltáncolni, mintsem hogy ezek rendelkezzenek egy normális útkereséssel. Nagyon sok alkalommal voltam szemtanúja annak, hogy az AI egyáltalán nem reagál a játékos jelenlétére, vagy a falnak fut nekifele, vagy ráugrik a játékos hitboxának tetejére és ott breakdance-szel, vagy csak simán öngyilkos hajlamuktól vezérelve levetik magukat a mélybe. Kiábrándító. A mozgás hiába gyors és folyékony, ha sokszor olyan alapvető dolgok is kihívást okoznak, mint a létremászás, a platformokra való felugrás, vagy a vízből való kiugrás. Az ajtók csakis kizárólag egyetlen egy irányba nyílnak, ami főleg akkor tud igazán zavaró lenni, ha az ember eltévedt és oda-vissza rohangál a pályán. Bár ez még a jobbik eset, mert olykor egyáltalán ki se nyílnak bizonyos ajtók, még a sokadik próbálkozásra sem. Kitalálhatjátok, hány alkalommal szopattam meg ezzel magam, mert azt hittem, hogy azon az ajtón nem is lehet áthaladni, közben pedig ott kellett tovább menni, csak kurvára nem volt hajlandó kinyílni az a nyomorult ajtó. A szinkronhangok egyébként jók, Caleb beszólásain ismét jókat derültem, és rengeteg popkultúrális utalás van ebben a játékban is, hasonlóan az első részhez. A zene kiváló, imádom ezeket a sötét hangulatú dallamokat nagyon passzol az atmoszférához. Az átvezetőket nézni nekem felért egy kínzással, mert a karakterek közti kamerarángatástól felfordult a gyomrom, a párbeszédek pedig olyan bénán vannak megírva, hogy ennél már láttam jobb történettel rendelkező pornófilmet is. Teljesen felesleges volt a további karakterek erőltetése, ehelyett fordíthatták volna az időt mondjuk tesztelésre és bugfixelésre, de ez már azt hiszem így marad.

Az első generációs LithTech Engine szépen muzsikál. A játék szerintem még mai szemmel is vállalhatóan néz ki, bár olykor kissé sötétek az egyes helyszínek, de sohasem volt olyan problémám, hogy a sötétség miatt ne tudtam volna továbbjutni. Az ellenfelek választékosak, most is jó számmal fordulnak elő túlvilági lények és e világi gengszterek/kommandósok is, elég jó a balansz közöttük. Mondjuk aki kitalálta azokat a kurva facehuggereket, annak... adnék egy díszdobozos Alien gyűjtői kiadást! A Gib mechanika viszont nagyon túlzásba van víve. Az ellenfelek sokszor egy egyszerű pisztolylövéstől cafatokra robbannak, ami egyébként nem lenne egy rossz feature, de ez így ebben a formában szerintem kissé túlzás. Modern rendszereken egy kis Voodoo mágiával könnyedén mozgásra bírható, akár 1080p felbontásban is, bár még így is nagyon sokszor hajlamos a fagyásokra és crashelésekre, főleg a kiegészítő. De ha ettől sikerül eltekinteni, teljes mértékben élvezhető a játék. Nem mondom, hogy igazán felemelő élményt nyújtott a játék, és megértem a fanyalgókat is, de szerintem közel sem annyira rossz, mint amennyire sokan beállítják. Bár a Shogo-val még nem játszottam, lehet csak azért vagyok ezen a véleményen. Mindenesetre másfél eurót simán megér, főleg a régi játékok szerelmeseinek!

author: {'steamid': '76561198278275713', 'num_games_owned': 564, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 375, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 375, 'last_played': 1488561743}
review:
First of all, when Blood2 was released in 1998, it was one of my favorite shooter right away. It had a good gunplay, varied weapons and enemies, as well as a good level design. Overall, I had a lot of fun with it.

So why the negative rating?
Because the game is almost unplayable on a current PC with a current operating system. I tried every guide, but in the end the game always remained very unstable and crashes on average every 5 minutes.
Without a lot of mods / patches the game is not playable at all.

It is time for Steam to introduce a quality control to prevent games being offered at Steam that can not be played on current computers. Please Steam, do something against it!

author: {'steamid': '76561198076042956', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 17, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1487626305}
review:
There's quite a lot wrong with this game.

The writing sucks hard. It has all the finesse of something written by a 13 years old.
The level design is bland and feels incomplete. Definitely a step back from the original game.
The difficulty is not balanced properly. I played the game in the recommended difficulty, and kept finding myself running out of ammo. The enemies sometimes feel unfairly overpowered, for example one of the most basic enemy unit, a machinegun wielding soldier, can shoot you the first microsecond you enter their field of view, so it's realy hard not to take damage from them. To make matters worse, the game performs poorly on modern systems. I got it to run fairly smoothly and even at a reasonable resolution, but whenever there's dynamic lightning the framerate drops to the point that it's not pleasant to play.

Is there something good about this game? Not really. It feels like it could've used another 6 months of development. Unless you're a completionist, skip this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198307275162', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 3963, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 391, 'last_played': 1633270844}
review:
Нормальная часть блада по мне. Многие говорят, что она спорная по сравнению с первой.

И да, кстати, она ещё плохо оптимизирована на Windows 8.1. О том, как это исправить, можно найти в одном из обсуждений в стиме.

author: {'steamid': '76561198033757873', 'num_games_owned': 194, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 8612, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4261, 'last_played': 1684425315}
review: Игру безосновательно кличут в народе фэйлом. Сама игра вообще ни разу не фэйл, вышла она достохвальной, у нее скромный калорит с чуть менее, чем хорошим обилием действия, но общий дух и концепция хорошей выдержки. Игра назовется фэйлом исключительно в понимании "вторая часть", лишь сравнивая их обе раскрывается причина бурления каловых масс в комьюнити, однако будучи плохим сиквелом ей ничто не накладывает ограничений на качество с точки зрения компьютерной игры. Ее недостаток - капризность выше Minecraft'овской, однако последние разы лично у меня проблем с запуском не было. Оружие хорошо чувствуется, дышится легко, заниматься шутерской деятельностью в данном продукте - приятно. Игра свою цель выполнила.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119731825', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 7967, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3985, 'last_played': 1480910277}
review:
A positive review because of that guy in the washing machine. :)

My opinion is: [b]IF[/b] you [b]LOVE[/b] the serie and [b]IF[/b] it is on sale, buy it.

This game is newer and uses newer graphics engine, but the ancient Blood I is still better IMHO. Moreover, there are some bugs present in that game from the very beginning (it is not the Steam version problem) that cause game crashes. I also have to redefine some keys every launch. If you encounter 1FPS problem, switch to software rendering engine or browse the community forum for tweaks.
On the other hand, I have no problems in launching the game under Windows 10 64-bit (Intel i7, Intel HD Graphics GPU + Nvidia GPU) and Steam always installs all game files correctly for me.

[i]DISCLAIMER: If you are 2000+ era and have never heard about the serie, you may simply don't get all the joy we got back then and better skip this title![/i]
But if you are [b]really[/b] interested in the serie, you may also check Blood I.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009257741', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 883, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1657904871}
review:
Лето 2016: Игра не хочет работать в Windows 8.1, требует давно устаревший DX 6. Пробовал запустить в Windows XP. Запустилась, но в Direct 3D режиме ничерта не видно. Черный экран. Звук есть. 
Запустил игру в software режиме (т. е. без 3D ускорения). Заработала, но только до меню. При попытке запустить карту игра вылетает, а антивирус ругается на файл “client.exe”, мол троянец и удаляет его нафиг!

UPD (28.11.18): Игра запустилась на Win 10, но дальше заставки и менюшки пройти не удалось, при попытке начать игру она вылетает. :(

UPD (16.03.21): Игра не хочет запускаться на Win 10 v20H2. Ошибка рендера и видеорежима. :( Патч так и не подвезли. :(

UPD (17.05.22): Удалось запустить на Win 10 v21H2, вычитал, что надо оказывается установить разрешение в игре не больше 1280x960@16 . Версия из коробки: 2.1.233.

UPD (30.06.22): Прошел оригинальный сингл, игра крашется очень редко, антивирус не ругается. После прохождения допа напишу обзор подробнее.

UPD (15.07.22): Полностью прошёл игру на лёгком уровне сложности, чтобы не заморачиваться, т. к. игра забагована, из-за этого даже забавная: то враги виснут в воздухе, то их конечности. 
Боссы тоже забагованны: застревают в колоннах и стенах, поэтому побеждаются на раз-два. Исключение: первый босс. Он забагован настолько, что без подсказок с ютуба догадаться как его завалить почти невозможно. 
Атмосфера совсем не похожа на первый Blood, за исключением дополнительного эпизода, в котором появляются знакомые враги и локации
Короче, игра на один, может быть, два прохождения. И из-за багов не могу ей поставить палец вверх.

author: {'steamid': '76561198023714891', 'num_games_owned': 3267, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 1219, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 872, 'last_played': 1463964893}
review:
Первый Blood был настолько хорош, что кредит доверия ко второму, несмотря на множество отрицательных отзывов, был крайне высоким. Но даже это не спасает от критики увиденного. Что примечательно, все отрицательные отзывы можно поделить на три категории. И все они в равной степени справедливы.

I. Технические проблемы.
Игра вышла давно, никакого ремастеринга не было, поэтому проблем с запуском на современных ОС, понятное дело, не избежать. Есть несколько патчей и программ, которые ваши страдания облегчат, и игра будет даже работать в нужном вам разрешении, но все проблемы не решатся. Игра может вылетать, запускаться в окне или повесить компьютер намертво. Случается это, конечно, не часто, но будьте готовы. Эти проблемы пока что никакими инструментами не исправляются, но игра хотя бы работает, и на там спасибо.

II. Смена сеттинга.

Если сюжет первого Blood проходил в середине двадцатого века, то здесь же прошло сто лет. Технологии в игре развиты сильнее, чем в наше время, поэтому вместо старинных замков и гостиниц, где протекает деревянный потолок Калеб будет штурмовать научные лаборатории, станции метро, офисы мегазлой корпорации и другие места, котором бы не нашлось места в первой части. Лично мне такое решение кажется интересным, все-таки главный герой практический бессмертный, и рано или поздно он бы дожил до этого времени (не повернись сюжет по другому, конечно). Однако сюжет и его логика дает трещину. Не буду углубляться в спойлеры игры 17-летней давности, но здесь все в плане сюжета и лора игры совсем все плохо, если это кому-то важно.

III. "Другой" геймплей.

Это, пожалуй, самая главная проблема игры. При хорошем левел-дизайне, в Blood 2 очень скучно играть. Враги очень глупые, но при этом создается ощущение, что они находятся под влиянием аимбота - они мастерки попадают в игрока, стоит только высунуться из-за угла. Некоторые враги очень настолько скучные, сколько и сильные. Патроны тратятся быстрее чем собираются, и далеко не каждое оружие тут полезно и способно выручить в сложной ситуации. В результате игра становится невероятно сложнее чем от нее требуется. Вместо хардкорных плясок с пушками и стрейфами игроку придется тратить как можно меньше патронов и загружаться в случае разбазаривания десятка пуль. Это было бы простительно отдельной или специальной сложности, но никак не средней или высокой.

P.S. Не могу не сказать пару слов добрых про аддон The Nightmare Levels, где не только множество геймплейных косяков все же починили, так еще и отправили Калеба в другую эпоху, где встречаются ребятки-культисты из первой части, которым в оригинале места почему-то не нашлось.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014687447', 'num_games_owned': 1206, 'num_reviews': 180, 'playtime_forever': 57, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1522842528}
review:
前作「Blood（1997）」の続編。

デュークニューケム風の３Dから完全３Dに移換したことにより、なめらかな表現が可能となっており、限定された空間だった前作とは異なったゲーム展開が売りである。

惜しむらくは前作のおどろおどろしいゴシック風の内容が、本作ではダークヒーローものに変更されているため、前作のテイストを好む方にはお勧めできない。だが、人間の死骸がつまった洗濯機など狂った世界観は再現されている。

初期のFPSなので、３Dが稚拙なこと、バグが多いことに目をつぶれば、面白いだろう。

Soon, I discovered a game called "Blood 2: The Chosen". My little autistic mind conjured demons, red to be the colour of choice, and scares all around. AND HO BABY WAS I NOT DISAPPOINTED. Caleb practicly became my personal hero, while the master cheif and COD were getting unworthy praise. While I have not tried out the original game (WHICH I WILL SOON), I can say this is a hardcore experiance. Forget COD, Forget COD, hell, forget ANY SHOOTER DURING THE HALO CRAZE, and give this a shot. Too bad this is a bitch to start, so beware, modern RIG users, this is one beast that will take time to tame.

SO WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR?! GET OUT THERE AND GET PEOPLE EXTRA CRISPY!

review:
I got it working in Windows 10. To set it up in high resolution I followed the directions here: http://steamcommunity.com/app/299050

To get it to run in Windows 10 I had to enable DirectPlay following these direction:

1. Right click Start
 2. Click Programs and Features
 3. Click Turn Windows features on or off
 4. Make sure there is a check in Legacy Components
 5. Click the + to expand
 6. Check the box for DirectPlay

The game runs great and now I can finally part with my old Windows 98 Laptop!!! For $2.49 you can't go wrong, but you will have to do some tweaking to get it to run in Windows 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994798873', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 487, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 480, 'last_played': 1457735269}
review:
Great oldschool FPS game, similar a bit to Quake and Duke Nukem 3D. Environment is destructable, almost every item can be destroyed. The game itself is of course very bloody, has nice locations, interesting enemies and awesome dark atmosphere, occult-themed. It's pretty long and so freaking HARD - even on medium difficulty.
The game has many technical problems with modern hardware configurations and new operating systems, but yet they released it on steam without fix (damn you Atari). 
However, it's nothing you can't fix yourself by replacing some files.
Definitely worth playing :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198176008658', 'num_games_owned': 970, 'num_reviews': 97, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1534575448}
review: Word to the wise: Don't enable any of the "Advanced" settings if you don't want this to crash. Run it on factory default and you're golden. That aside, this is one of those "so bad it's good" games. A bit of a repetative but catchy soundtrack, hammy one-liners you can't help but enjoy, and endless waves of fast-paced enemies if you're looking for good mindless killing fun and a great variety of both standard and occult-related weapons to help you do that. All in all, the game is dated and it shows, but it's still a lot of fun!
